code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Counter=()=>{const[count,setCount]=useState(0);const increment=()=>setCount(count+1);const decrement=()=>setCount(count-1);const reset=()=>setCount(0);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"counter",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"counter-display",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Count: ",count]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"counter-controls",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:decrement,className:"button counter-btn",children:"-"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:reset,className:"button counter-btn reset",children:"Reset"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:increment,className:"button counter-btn",children:"+"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"counter-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"This is a simple counter component with:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"Increment functionality"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"Decrement functionality"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"Reset functionality"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"State management with React hooks"})]})]})]});};export default Counter;
